name: Bims
description:
// ----------------- Instructions --------------- \\

Press WASD to move and SHIFT to sprint (no limit on sprinting)

going too far away from the center of the map will kill you (no losing health sound so be observant)

press E to open the inventory

there are 3 endings to the game, have fun

// ------------------- CREDITS ------------------- \\

the game and images were made by me
